title: Rengar’s Jump should be global
body: Rengar seems underpowered right now and this is the type of buff he needs.

replies.body:
Remember when Rengar ult didn't give you any warning and the only way to be 100% sure he actually ulted is to have a pink ward (see invis units) on yourself?

Good times.

> [{quoted}](name=2Charmnot2Charm,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eGxAbOwk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-30T00:51:05.345+0000)
>
> Remember when Rengar ult didn't give you any warning and the only way to be 100% sure he actually ulted is to have a pink ward (see invis units) on yourself?
> 
> Good times.

You used to have a warning, but by the time it popped you had like 1 second left
naaah, when he was just released his ult had 0 indication atall, then that was op as fuck so then they gave it an indicator
The sound was still there when Rengar was relatively close, but u had to react hyper fast, was almost impossible.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=StE-f3PqSQ8

This video pretty much sums up old rengar
what's the difference? lol
It is the difference between Rengar getting hook out of his ult by Thresh or not.
but his hook has a delay, rengar can jump on you and kill you by the time the hook flies
Good Thresh don't wait until Rengar jump, Good Thresh predict Q base on whoever has the indicator. The flay is a back up plan in case they fail predict the hook.
That actually looks pretty fair compared to live, look how much more time it takes.
Now it gives you .2 seconds before you die in .1 seconds

ADC: *respawns* 
Rengar: I am inevitable.
ADC: *Dies after stepping out of fountain*
you don't have to step out of fountain
lmfao jump at someone in base
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a2LpTxW2OEo
All assassins jumps are global in TFT
{{champion:107}} owo easy pwey...
I want to see this in one for all.
thats seems way to overpowered with no counter play, i would agree if {{champion:157}} wind wall would delete jumping {{champion:107}} .
I was just imagining Rengar jumping into Yasuo windwall and disappearing. Thanks.
This mental image is the third-greatest mental image I've had all day.
{{champion:223}} I love spitting minions through the wall and watching Yasuo's break down in complete confusion.
You just need some Iverns.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=StE-f3PqSQ8

Lane rengar is cancer as fuck.
He can jump to the entire width of the lane.
If the proposed change passes through, he can jump from top lane to bot lane!

> [{quoted}](name=Tuition Fee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eGxAbOwk,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2019-07-01T03:42:43.158+0000)
>
> If the proposed change passes through, he can jump from top lane to bot lane!

What are the proposed changes precisely?
I unironically checked to see if this was in memes.
And also make it one shot nexus with every turrets on

Good.

I wish people played Rengar more.

Let those ADC's and mages feel what it feels like to be an Illaoi or Garen and get mowed down by the unreachable ADC running you down in a couple of autoattacks.

Now you know what your counter feels like.

> [{quoted}](name=Crescent Dusk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eGxAbOwk,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2019-06-30T08:31:53.682+0000)
>
> Good.
> 
> I wish people played Rengar more.
> 
> Let those ADC's and mages feel what it feels like to be an Illaoi or Garen and get mowed down by the unreachable ADC running you down in a couple of autoattacks.
> 
> Now you know what your counter feels like.

The what? Those champions one on one can handle a fair amount of adc's. And if your talking about in a team fight, then the enemy team is doing their job.......

> [{quoted}](name=Prismghost,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eGxAbOwk,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2019-07-01T03:28:11.391+0000)
>
> The what? Those champions one on one can handle a fair amount of adc's. And if your talking about in a team fight, then the enemy team is doing their job.......

Yeah, and in a teamfight the Rengar is doing his job by deleting the adc. It's called a counter. As Illaoi and Garen I can do nothing in a TF against a protected ADC and die to the Vayne/Xayah/Sivir regardless of how much armor I have built in a couple of seconds, because ADC's are the counters to tanks and bruisers in TF. Assassins are supposed to be the counters to ADC's.

haha, thats interesting. I like that idea of just rengar is in brush and just leaps to help countergank from top lane. 

I didn't think rengar was in a bad state.
I know people will say hes broken, some will say hes trash, and others good. 
Just an overall pretty okay state. 
(I know the Op is a joke, But just makes me think if hes actually underpowered.)

Give me your thoughts on {{champion:107}} . 
Like why is he bad, why is good.
Overall winrate is fine but he's extremely binary.  He's either behind and does nothing at all, or he is ahead and becomes an unstoppable champion deleting machine.

His main problem is that he is snowbally due to his passive and this forces him to get early kills. He has to commit pretty heavily to both kills and ganks as well. Against a team that plays safely and wards, he won’t due well mid or late game because he just won’t have enough damage.
Real talk. I think Riot would get sued if they did this for the heart attacks it would induce in people.
brow what with all these people not getting the sarcasm
Probably with it being in gameplay instead of M&G.

I feel like if you have an area warded Rengar should not be able to jump, and maybe he gets an indicator when hes revealed via wards or other effects. This would not be awful because wards are only short term, and therefore would deter but not stop him.
bra, that would just be nocturne ult

Noc ult isnt even global anymore. 

Its long but not global and it needs levels to reach real far.

By all means nerf him. But nerf mages who can max out ap and 40% cdr while having zero mana issues and are allowed to brainlessly spamm their rotations off cooldown. And even before that gut adcs to unplayability so we don't have to deal with point and click resourcless burst per second for at least a single season.
Let's be reasonable here: only his ult jump.
Just make his ult to has  stealth again. What's the point of camoflauge if you announce yourself across the whole map.  Remove 2 secs duration before he gets fully camouflauged/stealthed.
